trans-unit.source: Password & Mnemonic is enough to restore wallet. Keep them in secret. A piece of paper in a safe vault is a good idea. Password manager is a good idea either, for example this one:
trans-unit.target: Password & Mnemonic is enough to restore wallet. Keep them in secret. A piece of paper in a safe vault is a good idea. Password manager is a good idea either, for example this one:

trans-unit.source: Error on getting the account from DB. Try again later. We investigate it. System message in case you need it:
trans-unit.target: Error on getting the account from DB. Try again later. We investigate it. System message in case you need it:

trans-unit.source: We constantly update the public address to make it more difficult for third parties to track your assets. Funds transferred to any generated address will be available.
trans-unit.target: We constantly update the public address to make it more difficult for third parties to track your assets. Funds transferred to any generated address will be available.

trans-unit.source: Error on getting the balance. Try again later. We investigate it. System message in case you need it:
trans-unit.target: Error on getting the balance. Try again later. We investigate it. System message in case you need it:

trans-unit.source: We're always looking for translation contributions! You can make corrections or help to make this app available in your language by joining our community on GitHub
trans-unit.target: We're always looking for translation contributions! You can make corrections or help to make this app available in your language by joining our community on GitHub

trans-unit.source: Invalid bitcoin address. Test network wallets are not able to sent coins to the Main network & vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Invalid bitcoin address. Test network wallets are not able to sent coins to the Main network & vice versa.

trans-unit.source: Can not verify your transaction. Try again or change fee policy.
trans-unit.target: Can not verify your transaction. Try again or change fee policy.

trans-unit.source: Can't parse the amount value. Try to change the decimal separator
trans-unit.target: Can't parse the amount value. Try to change the decimal separator

trans-unit.source: There is no account to send coins to the address from network. Network type:
trans-unit.target: There is no account to send coins to the address from network. Network type:

trans-unit.target: Save password in the encrypted database on this device

trans-unit.source: Invalid password. Please enter wallet's restoring password.
trans-unit.target: Invalid password. Please enter wallet's restoring password.

trans-unit.source: No Internet. Can't update amount & confirmations.
trans-unit.target: No Internet. Can't update amount & confirmations.

trans-unit.source: We don't track your assets. Your device will be using a background task to track your assets. The balance updating interval is not accurate it depends on your device's OS.
trans-unit.target: We don't track your assets. Your device will be using a background task to track your assets. The balance updating interval is not accurate it depends on your device's OS.

trans-unit.source: Search by short or full name
trans-unit.target: Search by short or full name

trans-unit.source: Testnet coins are separate and distinct from actual bitcoins and are never supposed to have any value
trans-unit.target: Testnet coins are separate and distinct from actual bitcoins and are never supposed to have any value

trans-unit.source: Bech32 pubkey hash or script hash
trans-unit.target: Bech32 pubkey hash or script hash

trans-unit.target: BIP32 pubkey (derived addresses are not supported yet)

trans-unit.source: BIP32 private key (derived addresses are not supported yet)
trans-unit.target: BIP32 private key (derived addresses are not supported yet)

trans-unit.source: This address type is not supported yet. Only Pubkey hash (P2PKH address), Script hash (P2SH address) & segwit (Bech32) are supported at this moment.
trans-unit.target: This address type is not supported yet. Only Pubkey hash (P2PKH address), Script hash (P2SH address) & segwit (Bech32) are supported at this moment.

trans-unit.source: Attention! It seems you don't have private key for this address. You can't spend coins without the private key.
trans-unit.target: Attention! It seems you don't have private key for this address. You can't spend coins without the private key.

trans-unit.source: With bank card via our partner
trans-unit.target: With bank card via our partner

trans-unit.source: We're looking for a partner for buying BTC with bank cards. We want to provide our users ability of fast & reliable BTC buying with the best price. If you want to be our partner or have any ideas about it please contact us.
trans-unit.target: We're looking for a partner for buying BTC with bank cards. We want to provide our users ability of fast & reliable BTC buying with the best price. If you want to be our partner or have any ideas about it please contact us.

trans-unit.source: Worldwide 3D secure cards except China, Japan & USA
trans-unit.target: Worldwide 3D secure cards except China, Japan & USA

trans-unit.source: The amount is less than minimum allowed
trans-unit.target: The amount is less than minimum allowed

trans-unit.source: The amount is more than maximum allowed
trans-unit.target: The amount is more than maximum allowed

trans-unit.source: With bank card via our partner
trans-unit.target: With bank card via our partner

trans-unit.source: New private key wallet will be added
trans-unit.target: New private key wallet will be added

trans-unit.source: Required. With Passport or Driver Licence & Selfie.
trans-unit.target: Required. With Passport or Driver Licence & Selfie.

trans-unit.source: Remote service which the app uses for querying balance & broadcasting transactions.
trans-unit.target: Remote service which the app uses for querying balance & broadcasting transactions.

trans-unit.source: Can't connect to the store. Check your internet connection & try again later.
trans-unit.target: Can't connect to the store. Check your internet connection & try again later.

trans-unit.source: Buy us a bottle of inspiration
trans-unit.target: Buy us a bottle of inspiration

trans-unit.source: Buy us a cup of coffee
trans-unit.target: Buy us a cup of coffee

trans-unit.source: After this day we get back and make the product even better
trans-unit.target: After this day we get back and make the product even better

trans-unit.source: This app stores all private data encrypted on this device. If you get lost password or mnemonic, you will not be able to restore your wallet and spend your money.
trans-unit.target: This app stores all private data encrypted on this device. If you get lost password or mnemonic you will not be able to restore your wallet and spend your money.

trans-unit.source: The only way to restore a wallet is by using the password and mnemonic. There are no other options available. We don't store your data anywhere else but this device. It's good for security, but you can get lost your money if you forget your wallet's password & mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: The only one way to restore a wallet is using password and mnemonic. There are no other options available. We don't store your data anywhere else but this device. It's good for security but you can get lost your money if you forget your wallet's password & mnemonic.

trans-unit.source: Although this program is secure enough, it's worth also to keep password & mnemonic in a secret place to be able to restore your wallet in case you get lost your device. A piece of paper in a safe vault is a good idea. A password manager is a good idea either.
trans-unit.target: Although this program is secure enough it's worth also to keep password & mnemonic in a secret place to be able to restore your wallet in case you get lost your device. A piece of paper in a safe vault is a good idea. Password manager is a good idea either.

trans-unit.source: Make payment regular, select wallet, amount, interval & period. The app would set a reminder in its calendar & prepare the payment page for you. All you'll need to do is to verify & confirm it.
trans-unit.target: Make payment regular, select wallet, amount, interval & period. The app would set a reminder in its calendar & prepare the payment page for you. All you'll need to do is to verify & confirm it.

trans-unit.source: You've got one or more unfinished regular payments for today. Go to the calendar page to pay.
trans-unit.target: You've got one or more unfinished regular payments for today. Go to the calendar page to pay.

trans-unit.source: Error. Verify your internet connection and try again. Message:
trans-unit.target: Error. Verify your internet connection and try again. Message:

trans-unit.source: Use P2PKH addresses. Slower, more expensive transactions but supported by everyone.
trans-unit.target: P2PKH addresses. Slower, more expensive transactions but supported by everyone.

trans-unit.source: Use Bech32 addresses. Faster, cheaper transactions but some participants might not support it.
trans-unit.target: Use Bech32 addresses. Faster, cheaper transactions but some participants might not support it.

trans-unit.source: Transaction address type (can be changed later)
trans-unit.target: Transaction address type (can be changed later)

trans-unit.source: Transaction address types are incompatible. Change it in the wallet's settings if you can't get your balance.
trans-unit.target: Transaction address types are incompatible. Change it in the wallet's settings if you can't get your balance.

trans-unit.source: Can't load a transaction for the address. Please, try again later.
trans-unit.target: Can't load a transaction for the address. Please, try again later.

trans-unit.source: Experimental feature. Use it at your own risk. Allows using BIP44 addresses generation for a wallet in its settings.
trans-unit.target: Experimental feature. Use it at your own risk. Allows using BIP44 addresses generation for a wallet in its settings.

trans-unit.source: To verify that you remember password & mnemonics correctly you can import a wallet with the same password & mnemonic. The imported wallet should have the same public addresses & balance.
trans-unit.target: To verify that you remember password & mnemonics correctly you can import a wallet with the same password & mnemonic. The imported wallet should have the same public addresses & balance.
